feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fold MongoDB unit tests into integration tests, delete MongoDB mocks. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13314
  • Feature/nps posthog by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13338
  • Allow SQL queries to pass null for empty bindings rather than empty string for new queries by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13336
  • Pull images separately from tests, enable testcontainers debug logs. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13344
  • Un-revert Skeleton Loader PR by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13180
  • Tidy vscode configs by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13352
  • [Changed] Identity override for event publish + BPM literals by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13345
  • Remove jest testcontainers by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13350
  • Fix additional scrollbar appearing when hiding binding panels by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13358
  • Fix issues with colours in app skeletons by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13355
  • Runs submodule checks only if you changed the submodule ref by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13362
  • [Changed] Update portal submodule by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13363
  • Ignore merge conflicts on pro submodule checks by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13364
  • Split build for account portal/monorepo by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13368
  • Better datasource default hosts by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13372
  • [Added] POST /api/global/users/sso endpoint by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13371

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.12...2.22.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix to ensure runtimeTime binding is used is automation js modal by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.13...2.22.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • acct-portal-sub by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13385
  • Support for oneOf filter in user search API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13386

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.14...2.22.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove QA core by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13387
  • Type frontend field types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13391
  • upgrading posthog-js to support surveys by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13392
  • Change the way we manage testcontainers by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13359
  • [Fix] Devtools crashing app preview by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13396

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.15...2.22.16

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.22.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Import/export attachment does not work by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13404
  • Remove pg mock. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13341
  • Fixing BB_ADMIN environment variable user creation by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13415

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.22.16...2.22.17
